def unique_in_order(element : String)
  unique_in_order element.split("").reject(&.empty?)
end

def unique_in_order(element : Array)
  res = element.class.new
  last = nil
  element.each do |c|
    res << c if c != last
    last = c
  end
  res
end

def unique_in_order(vals)
  if vals.is_a? String
    vals.chars.chunk(&.itself).map(&.first.to_s).to_a
  else
    vals.chunk(&.itself).map(&.first).to_a
  end
end

def unique_in_order(element, prev = nil)
    return unique_in_order(element.chars.map(&.to_s)) if element.is_a?(String)
    element.reject do |e|
      prev == e
    ensure
      prev = e
    end
end

def u(l : Array(T)) forall T
  r = [] of T
  l.each { |e| r << e unless r[-1]? == e }; r
end

def unique_in_order(x)
  return u(x.chars.map(&.to_s)) if x.is_a?(String)
  u(x)
end

def unique_in_order(element)
  if element.is_a? String
    if element.empty?
      return [] of String
    end
    element = element.split ""
  else
    return element if element.empty?
  end
  r = [element[0]]
  element[1..].each do |v|
    if v != r.last
      r << v
    end
  end
  r
end

def unique_in_order(element)
  el = element.is_a?(String) ? element.chars.map(&.to_s) : element
  return el if el.empty?
  res = [el[0]]
  el[1..-1].each { |x| res << x if x != res.last }
  res
end

def unique_in_order(element)
  memory = ""
  elements = element.is_a?(Array) ? element : element.split("")
  
  elements.map do |char|
    result = memory == char ? nil : char
    memory = char
    
    result
  end.compact
end

require "big"

def decompose(s)
  ans = [] of String
  is_fract = s.includes?('/')
  x = 0.to_f64
  y = 1.to_f64
  if is_fract
    xs = s.split("/") 
    x = xs[0].to_f64
    y = xs[1].to_f64
  else
    x = s.to_f64
  end
  while x.divmod(1)[1] > 0.0
    x *= 10
    y *= 10
  end
  a = x.to_big_i
  b = y.to_big_i
  if a > b
    n = a.tdiv(b)
    a = a.divmod(b)[1]
    ans << n.to_s
  end
  while a > 0
    d = (BigFloat.new(b) / BigFloat.new(a)).ceil().to_big_i
    ans << "1/#{d}"
    a = a * d - b
    b *= d
  end
  return ans
end

def decomp_frac(s)
  res = [] of String
  arr = s.split("/").map { |x| x.to_i }
  if (arr[0] == 0)
    return [] of String
  end
  a = arr[0]; b = arr[1]
  if (a > b)
    res << (a / b).to_s
    a %= b
  end
  while(a > 0)
    dv = (b.to_f / a).ceil.to_i
    res << "1/" + dv.to_s
    a = a * dv - b; b = b * dv
  end
  res
end
def decomp_dec(s)
  a = s.to_f; b = 1
  while (a % 1 != 0)
    a *= 10.0; b *= 10.0
  end
  decomp_frac(a.to_i.to_s + "/" + b.to_i.to_s)
end

require "big"

def decompose(s)
  decomposition = [] of String
  rational = if s.index('.')
               i, d = s.split('.')
               decomposition << i unless i == "0"
               BigRational.new(d.to_i, "1#{d.gsub { '0' }}".to_i)
             elsif s.index('/')
               n, d = s.split('/').map(&.to_i)
               if (i = n / d) > 0
                 n -= d * i
                 decomposition << i.to_s
               end
               BigRational.new(n, d)
             else
               BigRational.new(s.to_i, 1)
             end

  (2..Int32::MAX).each do |d|
    break if rational == 0
    if rational.numerator == 1
      decomposition << rational.to_s
      break
    end
    if (r = BigRational.new(1, d)) <= rational
      decomposition << r.to_s
      rational -= r
    end
  end
  decomposition
end

def decompose(s)
    if md = s.match(/(\d+)\.(\d+)/)
        s = "#{(md[1].to_i*(10**md[2].size))+md[2].to_i}/#{10**md[2].size}"
    end
    frac = s.split('/').map(&.to_i)
    results = [] of String
    return results if frac.size != 2
    int_part = (frac[0].to_f/frac[1].to_f).floor.to_i
    if !int_part.zero?
      frac[0]-=int_part*frac[1]
      results.push(int_part.to_s)
    end
    while frac[0] != 0
        x = (frac[1].to_f/frac[0].to_f).ceil.to_i
        results.push("1/#{x}")
        frac[0] = (x * frac[0] - frac[1])
        frac[1] = (frac[1] * x)
    end
    return results
end

def fsub(n, d, i)
  l = d.lcm(i)
  n *= l / d
  n -= l / i
  g = n.gcd(l)
  [n / g, l / g]
end

def decompose(s)
  r = Array(String).new
  if s.includes? "."
    w, p = s.split(".")
    if w != "0"
      r << w
    end
    return r if p == "0"
    n, d = [0, 1]
    p.chars.each do |c|
      n = n*10 + c.to_i
      d *= 10
    end
  elsif s.includes? "/"
    n, d = s.split("/").map {|i| i.to_i}
  else
    if s != "0"
      r << s
    end
    return r
  end
  if n >= d
    r << (n / d).to_s
    n = n%d
  end
  i = 2
  while !n.zero?
    if n*i >= d
      r << "1/#{i}"
      n, d = fsub(n, d, i)
    end
    i += 1
  end
  r
end

def is_sum_of_cubes(s)
  arr = s.each_char.chunk { |c| ('0' <= c <= '9') || Enumerable::Chunk::Drop }.flat_map do |(_, sequence)|
    sequence.each_slice(3, true).map(&.map(&.-('0'))).reduce([] of Int32) do |acc, n|
      num = n.reduce(0) { |n, d| n * 10 + d }
      next acc unless num == n.map(&.**(3)).sum
      acc << num
    end
  end.to_a
  arr.empty? ? "Unlucky" : "#{(arr << arr.sum).join(' ')} Lucky"
end

def cubic?(n)
  c = 0
  x = n
  while x > 0
    c += (x%10) ** 3
    x = x//10
  end
  n == c
end

def is_sum_of_cubes(s)
  nums = [] of Int32
  i = 0
  while i < s.size
    if s[i].number?
      n = s[i].to_i
      j = 1
      while (i+j) < s.size && j < 3
        if !s[i+j].number?
          break
        end
        n = n*10 + s[i+j].to_i
        j += 1
      end
      i += j - 1
      if cubic?(n)
        nums << n
      end
    end
    i += 1
  end
  return "Unlucky" if nums.empty?
  (nums.join " ") + " #{nums.sum} Lucky"
end

def is_sum_of_cubes(s)
  nums = s.scan(/\d{1,3}/).map(&.[0])
  cubes = nums.select{|x| x.chars.map(&.to_i).map(&.**(3)).sum == x.to_i}.map(&.to_i)
  if cubes.empty?
    "Unlucky"
  else
    (cubes + [cubes.sum, "Lucky"]).join(" ")
  end
end

def is_sum_of_cubes(s)
  all_nums = [] of String
  lucky_nums = [] of String

  s.scan(/(\d+)/).each do |n|
    if n[0].size > 3
      n[0].split("").each_slice(3) do |x|
        all_nums << x.join
      end
    else
      all_nums << n[0]
    end
  end

  all_nums.each do |x|
    if x.to_i == x.split("").map { |y| y.to_i ** 3 }.sum
      lucky_nums << x
    end
  end

  if lucky_nums.empty?
    "Unlucky"
  else
    "#{lucky_nums.map { |x| x.to_i }.join(" ")} #{lucky_nums.sum { |x| x.to_i }} Lucky"
  end
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  constant = Math::PI
  i = 1
  n = 1
  while (n * 4 - constant).abs > epsilon
    i += 2
    n += 1.0 / i * (i % 4 == 3 ? -1 : 1)
  end
  [(i + 1) / 2, (n * 4 * 1e10).round.fdiv(1e10)]
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  my_pi = i = 0
  while (my_pi - Math::PI).abs > epsilon
    my_pi += (i % 2 == 0 ? 4.0 : -4.0) / (2 * i + 1)
    i += 1
  end
  [i, (1e10 * my_pi).round / 1e10]
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  divisor = 1.0; sign = 1.0; count = 0; sum = 0.0
  while (sum - Math::PI).abs > epsilon
    sum += sign * 4.0 / divisor
    divisor += 2.0; sign *= -1.0; count += 1
  end
  r = (sum * 1e10).round / 1e10
  [ count, r ]
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  i=1
  n=1.0
  until (Math::PI - n * 4).abs <= epsilon
    n += (-1.0)**(i % 2)/(2*i+1)
    i+=1
  end
  [i,(n*4).round(10)]
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  my_pi = 0.0
  nb_loop = 0
  while(((my_pi*4)-Math::PI).abs >= epsilon)
    my_pi += ((nb_loop%2).zero? ? 1 : -1)/((nb_loop)*2+1)
    nb_loop+=1
  end
  return  [nb_loop, (my_pi*4).round(10)]
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  pi4 = 1.0
  sign = -1.0
  iterations = 1
  denom = 3.0
  while (4 * pi4 - Math::PI).abs >= epsilon
    pi4 += sign * (1.0 / denom)
    sign *= -1
    denom += 2
    iterations += 1
  end
  [iterations, (4 * pi4).round(10)]
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  i, t = 0, 1
  pi = t
  while (Math::PI - pi * 4).abs > epsilon
    i += 1
    t += 2
    pi += (i.even? ? 1.0 : -1.0) / t
  end
  [i+1, (pi * 4).round(10)]
end

require "math"

# Int32 overflow with built-in crystal .round
def string_round(val, dg = 1)
  sint, sdec = val.to_s.split(".")
  sround = (sdec[dg - 1..dg].to_i / 10.0).round.to_i
  "#{sint}.#{sdec[0..dg-2]}#{sround}".to_f64
end

def iter_pi(epsilon)
  val, n = 1.0, 1
  
  (3..Int32::MAX).step(2) do |i|
    val += (1.0 / i) * ((i / 2 % 2).zero? ? 1 : -1)
    n += 1
    break if (Math::PI - val * 4.0).abs < epsilon
  end
  [n, string_round(val * 4.0, 10)]
end

def evaporator(content, evap_per_day, threshold)
  aux(content.to_f, evap_per_day.to_f / 100, threshold.to_f / 100, content, 0)
end

private def aux(content, evap_per_day, threshold, max_content, count)
  if (content / max_content) > threshold
    aux(content * (1 - evap_per_day), evap_per_day, threshold, max_content, count + 1)
  else
    count
  end
end

def evaporator(content, evap_per_day, threshold)
  days = 0
  min = content * threshold / 100
  while content >= min
    content -= evap_per_day / 100 * content
    days += 1
  end
  days
end

  cnt = 0
  t = content * threshold / 100
  while content > t
    content = content - ((evap_per_day / 100) * content)
    cnt = cnt + 1
  end
  return cnt
end

    end
    return days
end

def moving_shift(s, shift)
  r = s.chars.map_with_index{|c,i| c.letter? ? c.ord < 95 ? (65+(c.ord+i+shift-65)%26).chr : (97+(c.ord+i+shift-97)%26).chr : c }.each_slice((s.size/5).ceil.to_i).to_a.map(&.join)
  r.size == 5 ? r : r + [""]
end

def demoving_shift(arr, shift)
  arr.join.chars.map_with_index{|c,i| c.letter? ? c.ord < 95 ? (65+(c.ord-i-shift+26-65)%26).chr : (97+(c.ord-i-shift+26-97)%26).chr : c }.join
end

def moving_shiftAux(s, shift, sgn)
    res = ""
    v = s.scan(/(\w|\W)/).flatten.map{ |md| md[0].to_s }.each_with_index do |x, k|
        sVal = (sgn * (shift + k)) % 26
        x = x[0]
        if (x.ord >= 'A'.ord  && x.ord <= 'Z'.ord) 
            c = (((x.ord - 'A'.ord + sVal) % 26) + 'A'.ord).chr
        elsif (x.ord >= 'a'.ord  && x.ord <= 'z'.ord) 
            c = (((x.ord - 'a'.ord + sVal) % 26) + 'a'.ord).chr
        else c = x end
        res += c
    end
    res
end

def moving_shift(s, shift)
    v = moving_shiftAux(s, shift, 1)
    p, r = v.size.divmod(5)
    if (r != 0) 
        p += 1 
    end
    a = v.scan(/.{1,#{p}}/).map{ |md| md[0].to_s }
    if (a.size == 4) 
        a << "" 
    else a end
end

def demoving_shift(arr, shift)
    s = arr.join
    moving_shiftAux(s, shift, -1)
end

def moving_shift(s, shift)
  a = s.chars.each_with_index.map {|(c,i)| shift_by c, shift + i }.in_groups_of((s.size / 5.0).ceil.to_i).map(&.join).to_a
  a.size < 5 ? a << "" : a
end

def shift_by(char, shift : Int32)
  return char unless char.letter?
  offset = char >= 'a' ? 'a' : 'A'
  offset + (char.ord + shift - offset.ord) % 26
end

def demoving_shift(arr, shift)
  i = -1
  arr.map {|s| s.chars.map {|c| shift_by c, -(shift + (i += 1)) }.join }.join
end

def encode(c, s)
  alphabet = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"
  uppercase = c.uppercase?
  sus = alphabet.index(c.upcase).not_nil!
  sus = (sus + s) % 26
  sus = alphabet[sus]
  uppercase ? sus : sus.downcase
end

def decode(c, s)
  alphabet = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"
  uppercase = c.uppercase?
  sus = alphabet.index(c.upcase).not_nil!
  sus = (sus - s) % 26
  sus = alphabet[sus]
  uppercase ? sus : sus.downcase
end

def moving_shift(s, shift)
  enc = ""
  s.each_char do |c| 
    if c.letter?
      enc += encode(c, shift)
    else
      enc += c
    end
    shift += 1
  end
  len = enc.size
  part_size = (len / 5).ceil.to_i
  res = Array(String).new(5) { "" }
  idx = -1
  enc.each_char_with_index do |c, i|
    if i % part_size == 0
      idx += 1
    end
    res[idx] += c
  end
  res
end

def demoving_shift(arr, shift)
  dec = ""  
  arr.join.each_char do |c|
    if c.letter?
      dec += decode(c, shift)
    else
      dec += c
    end
    shift += 1
  end
  dec
end

SALPH = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz".chars
BALPH = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ".chars

def moving_shift(s, shift)
  s = s.chars.map { |c|
    shift += 1
    if index = SALPH.index c
      SALPH.rotate(shift - 1)[index]
    elsif index = BALPH.index c
      BALPH.rotate(shift - 1)[index]
    else
      c
    end
  }.in_groups_of((s.size.to_f / 5).ceil.to_i).map(&.join(""))
  s.size == 4 ? s + [""] : s
end

def demoving_shift(arr, shift)
  shift -= 1
  arr.join.chars.map { |c|
    shift += 1
    if index = SALPH.index c
      SALPH.rotate(-1 * shift)[index]
    elsif index = BALPH.index c
      BALPH.rotate(-1 * shift)[index]
    else
      c
    end
  }.join
end

    end
  }.join("")

require "big"

def sum_fracts(lst)
  if lst.empty?
    return nil
  end
  result = lst.sum do |x|
    n, d = x
    BigRational.new(n, d)
  end
  n, d = result.numerator, result.denominator
  d == 1 ? n : [n, d]
end

require "big"

def sum_fracts(lst)
  res = lst.map { |n| BigRational.new(n[0].to_big_i, n[1].to_big_i) }.sum.to_s
  if res.includes?("/")
    [res.split("/")[0].to_i, res.split("/")[1].to_i]
  elsif lst.empty?
    nil
  else
    res.to_i
  end
end

def tour(f, fTowns, d)
  t = fTowns.to_h
  r = t[f[0]]? ? d[t[f[0]]] : d[t[f[1]]]
  r+= t[f[-1]]? ? d[t[f[-1]]] : d[t[f[-2]]]
  (1...f.size).each do |i|
    next unless t[f[i-1]]? && t[f[i]]?
    r += Math.sqrt(d[t[f[i]]]**2-d[t[f[i-1]]]**2)
  end
  r.to_i
end

require "math"

def tour(friends, fTowns, distTable)
  total_dist = 0.0
  last_dist = 0.0
  friends.each do |friend|
    fTowns.each do |fTown|
      if friend == fTown[0]
        total_dist += get_distance(last_dist, distTable[fTown[1]])
        last_dist = distTable[fTown[1]]
      end
    end
  end
  total_dist += last_dist
  total_dist.floor
end

def get_distance(dist1, dist2)
  Math.sqrt(dist2**2 - dist1**2)
end

struct Int32
  def prime?
    !(2..Math.sqrt(self)).any? { |x| self % x == 0 }
  end
  
  def reverse
    to_s.reverse.to_i
  end
end

def backwards_prime(start, stop)
  (start..stop).select { |candidate|
    reversed = candidate.reverse
    candidate != reversed && candidate.prime? && reversed.prime?
  }
end

def backwards_prime(start, stop)
    arr = Array(Int32).new
    n = start
    while n <= stop
        if isPrime(n)
            m = backwards(n)
            if m != n && isPrime(m)
                arr << n
            end
        end
        n = n + 1
    end
    arr
end

def backwards(n)
    n.to_s.split(//).reverse.join().to_i32
end

def isPrime(n)
    i = 2
    while i <= n ** 0.5
        if n % i == 0
            return false
        end
        i = i + 1
    end
    n > 1
end

class Global
  class_property max = 10_000_000
  class_property sieve : Array(Bool) = Array.new(max + 1, true)
end

Global.sieve[0] = false
Global.sieve[1] = false

2.step(to: Math.sqrt(Global.max)) do |i|
  if Global.sieve[i]
    (i * i).step(to: Global.max, by: i) do |j|
      Global.sieve[j] = false
    end
  end
end

def backwards_prime(start, stop)
  result = Array(Int32).new
  start.upto(stop) do |n|
    r = n.to_s.reverse.to_i
    result << n if n != r && Global.sieve[n] && Global.sieve[r]
  end
  result
end

def backwards_prime(start, stop)
  primes = Array(Int32).new
  (start..stop).each do |num|
    if prime?(num) && prime?(num.to_s.reverse.to_i) && num.to_s != num.to_s.reverse
      primes << num
    end
  end
  primes
end

def prime?(num)
  (1...(num/2)).each do |div|
    return false if num % (div*2+1) == 0
  end
  num % 2 != 0
end

def unique_chars?(str)
  seen = BitArray.new(128)

    seen[c] = true
  end
  true
end

def product_fib(prod : UInt64)
  a, b = [0_u64, 1_u64]
  while prod > a * b
    a, b = [b, a + b]
  end
  [a, b, prod == a * b]
end

def product_fib(prod : UInt64)
  a, b = 0u64, 1u64
  while a * b < prod
    a, b = b, a + b
  end
  [a, b, a * b == prod]
end

def product_fib(prod : UInt64)
  a : UInt64 = 0

  end

  cur, nxt = 0_u64, 1_u64

  while true

    a, b = b, a + b
  end

    seen

  if l != w

def walk(arr, a, b)
  l = Math.max(a, b)
  w = Math.min(a, b)
  if w != 0
    arr << w
    l -= w
    walk(arr, w, l)
  end
end

  end
  
  squares

  return [] of Int32 if l <= 0 || w <= 0

  }

        ret.push w1
        l1 = l1 - w1   
      end
      ret
    end
end

def remove_nb(n : UInt64)
  total =  n*(n+1)/2
  result = Array(Array(Int32)).new
  (1..n).reverse_each do |v|
    tmp = (total-v).divmod(v)
    if tmp[0]==tmp[1] && tmp[0]<=n
      result.push([tmp[0].to_i, v.to_i]) 
      result.push([v.to_i, tmp[0].to_i]) 
    end
  end
  return result.sort{|a, b| a[0] <=> b[0]}
end

def remove_nb(n : UInt64)
  r = [] of Array(Int32)
  s = (n*(n+1))/2
  (1_u64...n).each do |i|
    m = s%i
    if i*m == s-i-m
      r << [i.to_i32, m.to_i32] << [m.to_i32, i.to_i32]
    end
  end
  r.sort_by &.[](0)
end

  s = [] of Array(UInt64)

  end
  s

include Math
def remove_nb(n : UInt64)
    puts n
    sum = ((n + 1) / 2.0 * n).to_u64
    
    pairs1, pairs2 = [] of Array(Int32), [] of Array(Int32)
    maxi = sqrt(sum).floor.to_u64
    puts maxi
    
    i = 2_u64
    while  i < maxi
      sumi = sum - i
      maxj = [sumi / i, n].min
      minj = [(sumi - n) / i, i].max
      j = (maxj + minj) / 2
      
      while maxj > minj + 1
        sumj = sumi - j
        prod = i * j
        if prod == sumj
          pairs1 << [i.to_i32, j.to_i32]
          pairs2 << [j.to_i32, i.to_i32]
          break
        end
        minj, j, maxj = prod < sumj ? {j, (j + maxj) / 2, maxj} : {minj, (j + minj) / 2, j}
      end
      i += 1
    end

    pairs1 + pairs2.reverse
end

def nb_months(spo, spn, svpm, plbm)
  return [0, spo - spn] if spo >= spn
  month = 1
  diff = spn - spo
  while diff > 0
    plbm += 0.5 if month.even?  
    diff -= svpm + spn * plbm.fdiv(100) - spo * plbm.fdiv(100)  
    spn -= spn * plbm.fdiv(100) 
    spo -= spo * plbm.fdiv(100)
    month += 1
  end
  [month - 1, diff.round.abs]
end

def nb_months(p0, p1, s, r, m = 0, t = 0)
  return [m, (p0 - p1 + t).round()] if p1 <= p0 + t
  p0 -= p0 * 0.01 * r
  p1 -= p1 * 0.01 * r
  t += s
  m += 1
  r += 0.5 if (m.odd?)
  nb_months(p0, p1, s, r, m, t)
end

def nb_months(priceOld, priceNew, saving, loss)
    saved, months = 0, 0
    while priceOld+saved < priceNew
        priceOld -= priceOld * loss / 100.0
        priceNew -= priceNew * loss / 100.0
        saved  += saving
        months += 1
        loss += 0.5 if months % 2 > 0
    end
    [months, (priceOld + saved - priceNew).round.to_i]
end

def nb_months(o, n, spm, l)
  s=0
  m=0
  while s<n-o
    s+=spm
    m+=1
    if m%2==0
      l+=0.5
      end
    n=n.to_f*(1-l/100.0)
    o=o.to_f*(1-l/100.0)
    end
  [m,(s+o-n).round]
end

def nb_months(priceOld, priceNew, saving, loss)
  return [0, priceOld - priceNew] if priceOld >= priceNew
  m, s = 0, 0
  loop do
    priceOld -= priceOld * (loss / 100.0)
    priceNew -= priceNew * (loss / 100.0)
    s += saving
    m += 1
    return [m, (priceOld + s - priceNew).round] if priceOld + s >= priceNew
    loss += 0.5 if m.odd?
  end
end

require "big"

def nb_months(price_old, price_new, saving, loss)
  months = 0
  have = 0.to_big_r
  need = price_new.to_big_r - price_old.to_big_r
  saving = saving.to_big_r
  loss = loss.to_big_r / 100
  loop do
    return [months, (have - need).round] if have >= need
    months += 1
    have += saving
    need *= 1 - loss
    loss += BigRational.new(5, 1000) if months.odd?
  end
end

def nb_months(priceOld, priceNew, saving, loss)
  month = 0
  total_savings = 0
  balance = total_savings + priceOld - priceNew
  while balance < 0
    # wait another month
    month += 1
    total_savings += saving
    loss_factor = (100.0 - loss) / 100.0
    priceOld *= loss_factor
    priceNew *= loss_factor
    if month % 2 == 1
      loss = loss + 0.5  
    end
    balance = total_savings + priceOld - priceNew
  end
  [month, balance.round(0).to_i]
end

def nb_months(priceOld, priceNew, saving, loss)
    needed, saved, n = priceNew - priceOld, 0, 0
    while needed > saved
      n += 1
      needed *= (1.0 - loss * 0.01)
      saved += saving
      loss += 0.5 * (n % 2)
    end
    [n, (saved - needed).round]
end

def nb_months(priceOld, priceNew, saving, loss)
    months=0
    while priceOld+saving*months < priceNew     
      months+=1
      priceOld-=(priceOld*loss/100)
      priceNew-=(priceNew*loss/100)
      loss+=0.5 if months.odd?
    end
    saving=(0.5+priceOld+saving*months-priceNew).to_i
    [months,saving]
end

LOSS_INCREASE = 0.5 / 100.0

def nb_months(priceOld, priceNew, saving, loss)
  loss /= 100.0
  money = 0
  months = 0
  
  loop do
    money = priceOld + (saving * months)
    
    break if money >= priceNew
    
    months += 1
    loss = (loss + LOSS_INCREASE).round(4) if months.even?
    
    priceOld -= (priceOld * loss)
    priceNew -= (priceNew * loss)
  end
  
  [months,(money - priceNew).round.to_i]
end

def sol_equa(n : Int64)
  	res = [] of Array(Int64)
    1_i64.upto(Math.sqrt(n)) do |i_i64|
        if (n % i_i64) == 0
            p = i_i64; q = n / i_i64
            if ((p + q) % 2 == 0) && ((q - p) % 4 == 0)
                res << [(p + q) / 2, (q - p) / 4]
            end
        end
    end
    res
end

include Math

def sol_equa(n : Int64)
  
  	#ans = Array(Array(Int64)).new 
    ans = [] of Array(Int64)
  
    m = Math.sqrt(n).floor.to_i
    (1..m).map{|i| 
        d = n.to_f / i
        x = (d+i) / 2
        y = (d-i) / 4
        if (d%1) == 0 && (x%1) == 0 && (y%1) == 0
            ans << [x.to_i64, y.to_i64]
        end
    }
  
    ans
end

def josephus_survivor(n, k)
  a = 0
  (2..n).each do |i|
    a = (a+k)%i
  end
  a+1
end

def josephus_survivor(n, k)
  if n == 1
    1
  else
    (josephus_survivor(n - 1, k) + k - 1) % n + 1
  end
end

def josephus_survivor(n, k)
  ring = (1..n).to_a
  while ring.size > 1
    ring.rotate!(k - 1).shift
  end
  ring.last
end

def josephus_survivor(n, k)
  i = 0
  s = (1..n).to_a
  while s.size > 1
    i = (i+k-1) % s.size
    s.delete_at(i)
  end
  s.first
end

def josephus_survivor(n, k)
  pointer = 0
  range = Array.new(n) { |i| i+1 }
  while range.size > 1
    pointer = pointer + k
    while pointer > range.size
      pointer = pointer - range.size
    end
    pointer -= 1
    range.delete_at(pointer)
  end
  range[0]
end

def josephus_survivor(n, k)
  alive = (1..n).to_a
  idx = k - 1
  loop do
    return alive[0] if alive.size == 1
    idx %= alive.size
    alive.delete_at(idx)
    idx += k - 1
  end
end

def dna_to_rna(dna)
  # if dna exist and dna not empty string
  if dna && dna !=""
    # check if T exist in DNA
    if dna.includes?("T")
      # using gsub to replace T with U
      dna = dna.gsub("T", "U")
    end
  end
  p! dna
end

def dna_to_rna(dna)
  rna = ""
  dna.each_char do |blib|
    if blib == 'T'
      rna += 'U'
    else
      rna += blib
    end
  end
  rna
end

def reverse_number(n)
  f = n < 0 ? -1 : 1
  n *= f
  m = 0
  while (n > 0)
    d = n % 10
    n = (n/10).to_i
    m *= 10
    m += d
  end
  m * f
end

def reverse_number(n)
  return -reverse_number(-n) if n < 0
  n.to_s.reverse.to_i
end

def reverse_number(n)
  return -reverse_number(-n) if n < 0
  m = 0
  while n > 0
    m = m * 10 + n % 10
    n /= 10
  end
  m
end

  sign = n.sign
  n.abs.to_s.reverse.to_i * sign
end

module Cubes
  @@c_cache = {} of Int32 => Int64
  
  
  def self.compute(n : Int32) : Int64
    return 1_i64 if n == 1
    
    @@c_cache[n] ||= n.to_i64 ** 3 + compute(n - 1)
  end
  
  def self.solve(m : Int64, n = 1)
    k = compute(n)
    
    return solve(m, n + 1) if k < m
    return n if k == m
    return -1 if k > m
  end
end

def find_nb(m : Int64)
  Cubes.solve(m)
end

def find_nb(m : Int64)
  num = Math.sqrt(m)
  return -1 unless num % 1 == 0
  num *= 2
  res = (Math.sqrt(num)).floor
  (res * (res+1) / 2) ** 2 == m ? res : -1
end

def play_pass(str, n)
    str.chars
      .map do |char|
        if char.in_set? "A-Z"
          'A' + (char + n - 0x41).ord % 26
        elsif char.digit?
          '9' - char.ord + 0x30
        else
          char
        end
      end
      .map_with_index { |char, i| (i.odd?) ? char.downcase : char.upcase }
      .reverse
      .join
end

def play_pass(str, n)
  a_ord   = 'A'.ord
  max_ord = 'Z'.ord - a_ord + 1
  
  pass = String.build(str.size) do |sb|
    str.each_char_with_index do |c,i|
      if c.letter?
        c = (((c.ord - a_ord + n) % max_ord) + a_ord).chr
        c = i.odd? ? c.downcase : c.upcase
      elsif c.ascii_number?
        c = (9 - c.to_i).to_s
      end
      
      sb << c
    end
  end
  
  pass.reverse
end

def play_pass(str, n)
    res = ""
    str.chars.to_a.each_with_index do |x, i|
        if (x.ord >= 'A'.ord  && x.ord <= 'Z'.ord)
            c = (((x.ord - 'A'.ord + n) % 26) + 'A'.ord).chr 
        else 
            if (x.ord >= '0'.ord  && x.ord <= '9'.ord)
                c = (105 - x.ord).chr
            else
                c = x 
            end
        end
        if (i.odd?) 
            res += c.downcase 
        else 
            res += c.upcase 
        end
    end
    res.reverse
end

ALPHABET = ("A".."Z").to_a

def play_pass(str, n)
  str.upcase.tr(ALPHABET.join, ALPHABET.rotate(n).join)
    .each_char.map_with_index do |c, i|
      r = c.to_i? ? (9 - c.to_i).to_s : c.to_s
      r = c.to_s.downcase if i.odd? && !c.to_i?
      r
    end.reverse.join
end

def play_pass(str, n)
  String.build(str.size) do |buff|
    ch_l = 'a'
    ch_r = 'z'
    letters = ch_l..ch_r
    numbers = '0'..'9'
    i = 0
    # Downcase and reverse
    str.downcase.reverse.each_char do |char|
      buff << if letters.includes? char
        # Shift letter
        ((i % 2 == str.size % 2) ? ch_l : ch_l.upcase) + ((char.ord - ch_l.ord + n) % (ch_r.ord - ch_l.ord + 1))
      elsif numbers.includes? char
        # Shift number
        9 - (char.ord - '0'.ord)
      else
        char
      end
      i += 1
    end
  end
end

def play_pass(str, n)
  pf : String = ""

  String.build do |s|
    str.each_char_with_index do |c, i|
      offset = (c.ord + n) > 90 ? 26 : 0
      
      case c.to_s
      when /[[:alpha:]]/i
        if i.odd?
          s << (c + n - offset).downcase
        else
          s << (c + n - offset).upcase
        end
      when /[[:digit:]]/
        s << 9 - c.to_i
      else
        s << c
      end
    end
  end.reverse
end

# This version uses String.build since it's much faster than concatenation.
def play_pass(str, n) : String
    pf = String.build do |s|
      str.each_char_with_index do |c, i|
        case c.to_s
        when /[[:alpha:]]/i
          offset = (c.upcase.ord + n) > 90 ? 26 : 0
          s << (c.upcase + n - offset).to_s
        when /[[:digit:]]/
          s << (9 - c.to_i).to_s
        else
          s << c.to_s
        end
      end
    end
    
    copy = String.build do |s|
      pf.each_char_with_index do |c, i|
        if i == 0 || i % 2 == 0
          s << c.upcase
        else
          s << c.downcase
        end
      end
    end
    
    copy.reverse
end

def play_pass(str, n) : String
  pf = ""

  str.each_char_with_index do |c, i|
    case c.to_s
    when /[[:alpha:]]/i
      offset = (c.upcase.ord + n) > 90 ? 26 : 0
      pf = pf + (c.upcase + n - offset).to_s
    when /[[:digit:]]/
      pf = pf + (9 - c.to_i).to_s
    else
      pf = pf + c.to_s
    end
  end

  copy = ""
  pf.each_char_with_index do |c, i|
    if i == 0 || i % 2 == 0
      copy = copy + c.upcase
    else
      copy = copy + c.downcase
    end
  end

  copy.reverse
end

def choose(n : UInt64, p : UInt64) : UInt64
    if (p > n) 
      return 0_u64 
    end
    if (p > n - p) 
      p = n - p 
    end
    nu_u64 = (n - p + 1_u64 .. n).reduce(1_u64){|m_u64, e| m_u64 * e}
    de_u64 = (2_u64 .. p).reduce(1_u64){|m_u64, e| m_u64 * e}
    nu_u64 / de_u64
end

    choose(n+1, p+1)
end

    nu_u64 = (n - p + 1_u64 .. n).reduce(1_u64){|m_u64, e| m_u64 * e}

def choose(n : BigInt, k : BigInt) : BigInt

def mem_fact_fact
  memo = [] of BigInt
  memo.push 1.to_big_i
  return ->(i : Int32) do

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
  (m..n).each_with_object([] of Array(Int32 | Int64)) do |i, obj|
    a = [] of Int32
    (1..i).each { |j| a.push j**2 if i % j == 0 }
    s = a.sum
    obj.push [i, s] if Math.sqrt(s) == Math.sqrt(s).to_i
  end
end

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
  result = [] of Array(Int64)
  m.upto(n) do |i_i64|
    divisors = [] of Int64
    1_i64.upto(Math.sqrt(i_i64)) do |j_i64|
      if i_i64 % j_i64 == 0
        divisors << j_i64
        divisors << (i_i64 / j_i64) if j_i64 != i_i64 / j_i64
      end  
    end
    sum = divisors.map { |i_i64| i_i64 ** 2 }.reduce(0_i64){|m, e| m + e}
    sqr = Math.sqrt(sum)
    result << [i_i64, sum] if sqr.to_i.to_f == sqr
  end
  result
end

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
  (m..n).map { |i| [i, (1..i).select { |d| i % d == 0 }.map(&.**(2)).sum] }
    .select do |(_, s)|
      root = Math.sqrt(s)
      root.to_i == root
    end
end

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
    (m..n).map do |v|
        t = (1..Math.sqrt(v).ceil().to_i).flat_map { |j| v.divisible_by?(j) ? [(v/j).to_i**2, j.to_i64**2] : 1 }.uniq.sum().to_i64
        [v.to_i64, t] if(Math.sqrt(t)%1).zero?
    end.compact
end

def integer_sqrt(n : Int64) : Int64
    return n if n < 2
    small_cand = integer_sqrt(n >> 2) << 1
    large_cand = small_cand + 1_i64
    if large_cand * large_cand > n
        return small_cand
    else
        return large_cand
    end
end

def squared?(n : Int64)
    x = integer_sqrt n
    x*x == n
end

def divisors(n : Int64)
    (1_i64..n/2).to_a.select! { |x| n % x == 0 }
end

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
    result = [] of Array(Int64)
    (m..n).each do |k|
        s = divisors(k).<<(k).map{ |x| x*x }.sum
        result << [k, s] if squared? s 
    end
    result
end

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
  result = Array(Array(Int64)).new
  
  # iterate over the range m..n
  while m <= n 
    # find the divisors
    divisors = Array(Int64).new
    i = 1_i64
    while i <= m
      divisors.push(i) if m.divisible_by?(i)
      i += 1
    end
    
    # square them
    squared_divisors = divisors.map { |x| x * x }
  
    # sum
    sum = squared_divisors.sum
  
    # is sum a square?
    sqrt = Math.sqrt(sum)
    result.push([m, sum]) if sqrt.remainder(1.0) == 0
  
    m += 1
  end

  result
end

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
    xss = [] of Array(Int64)
    i = m
    while i <= n
        sum = 0.to_i64
        t = (i**0.5).to_i64
        j = 1.to_i64
        while j <= t
            sum += j**2 if i%j == 0
            sum += (i/j)**2 if i%j == 0 && j!=i/j
            j += 1
        end
        if sum**0.5 == (sum**0.5).to_i64
            xs = [] of Int64
            xs << i
            xs << sum
            xss << xs
        end
        i += 1
    end
    xss
end

def list_squared(m : Int64, n : Int64)
  filter_map(m..n) { |x|  
    s = filter_map(1..x) { |y| y * y if x % y == 0 }.sum
    [x, s] if Math.sqrt(s) % 1 == 0
  }
end

def filter_map(e : Enumerable(T), &block : T -> Nil | U) forall T, U
  res = [] of U
  e.each { |x| v = yield x; res << v if v }
  res
end

def disjunction(operands, is_exclusive)
    return operands.includes?(true) if !is_exclusive
    return operands[0] == !operands[1] if operands.size == 2  #trivial case
    # recursive call
    head = operands.shift(2)  # proccess first pair
    operands.unshift(disjunction(head, true)) # add result at the beginning
    return disjunction(operands, true) #recursively process the rest
end

def snd2time(n)
    n = n.to_i
    h = n / 3600
    re = n.modulo(3600)
    mn = re / 60
    s = re.modulo(60)
    "%02d|%02d|%02d" % [h, mn, s]
end

def stat_assoc(strg)
    if (strg == "") 
        return "" 
    end
    r = strg.split(/,/).map { |x| time2snd(x) }.sort
    lg = r.size
    avg = r.reduce(0){ |sum, x| sum + x } / lg.to_f
    rge = r[lg - 1] -  r[0]
    md = (r[(lg - 1) / 2] + r[lg / 2]) / 2.0
    "Range: %s Average: %s Median: %s" % [snd2time(rge), snd2time(avg), snd2time(md)]
end

def stat_assoc(input)
  return "" if input.empty?
  stat_assocs = input.split(", ").map(&.split("|").map(&.to_i)).map {|result| 
    result[0].hours + result[1].minutes + result[2].seconds
  }.sort
  
  range = stat_assocs.last - stat_assocs.first # we have to sort anyway for the median, so no use in .min / .max
  average = stat_assocs.sum / stat_assocs.size
  median = stat_assocs.size.odd? ? stat_assocs[stat_assocs.size / 2] : 
    (stat_assocs[stat_assocs.size / 2 - 1] + stat_assocs[stat_assocs.size / 2]) / 2
  
  "Range: #{format(range)} Average: #{format(average)} Median: #{format(median)}"
end

private def format(span)
  "%02d|%02d|%02d" % {span.hours, span.minutes, span.seconds}
end

def stat_assoc(strg)
  return "" if strg.empty?
  secs = strg.split(/, ?/).map { |i| parse(i) }
  range = to_time(secs.max - secs.min)
  avg = to_time(secs.sum / secs.size)
  median = to_time(secs.sort[((secs.size - 1) / 2)..(secs.size / 2)].sum / (secs.size % 2 == 0 ? 2 : 1))
  "Range: #{range} Average: #{avg} Median: #{median}"
end

def parse(str)
  str.split('|').reverse.map_with_index { |t, i| t.to_i * 60 ** i }.sum
end

def to_time(secs)
  t = secs.seconds
  "#{t.hours.to_s.rjust(2, '0')}|#{t.minutes.to_s.rjust(2, '0')}|#{t.seconds.to_s.rjust(2, '0')}"
end

def s2t (time)
  Array.new(3, 60).reduce(Array(String).new) { |r, x| r << ("0" + (time % x).to_i.to_s).sub(/.(?=..)/, ""); time /= x; r }.reverse.join("|")
end

def stat_assoc(strg)
  return "" if strg == ""
  ti = strg.split(", ").map { |x| z = x.split("|").map(&.to_i); z[0] * 3600 + z[1] * 60 + z[2] }.sort
  l  = ti.size
  "Range: #{s2t(ti.max - ti.min)} Average: #{s2t((ti.sum / l).to_i)} Median: #{s2t(((ti[((l - 1) / 2).to_i] + ti[(l / 2).to_i]) / 2).to_i)}"
end

def stat_assoc(strg)
  return "" if strg.empty?
  arr = strg.split(", ").map{ |s| s.split('|').map(&.to_i) }
  arr.sort!
  l = arr.size
  m = l / 2
  rng = adj_time(arr.max.zip(arr.min).map{ |(a, b)| a - b })
  avg = div_time(arr.reduce{ |s, t| adj_time(s.zip(t).map{ |(a, b)| a + b }) }, arr.size)
  med = l.odd? ? arr[m] : div_time(adj_time( arr[m - 1].zip(arr[m]).map{ |(a, b)| a + b }), 2)
  "Range: %02d|%02d|%02d Average: %02d|%02d|%02d Median: %02d|%02d|%02d" % (rng + avg + med)
end

def adj_time(time)
  if time[2] < 0
    time[2] += 60
    time[1] -= 1
  elsif time[2] > 59
    time[1] += time[2] / 60
    time[2] %= 60
  end
  if time[1] < 0
    time[1] += 60
    time[0] -= 1
  elsif time[1] > 59
    time[0] += time[1] / 60
    time[1] %= 60
  end
  time
end

def div_time(ar, l)
  h, m, s = ar
  ret = [h / l]
  m += (h % l) * 60
  ret << m / l
  s += (m % l) * 60
  ret << s / l
  ret
end

class Result
  include Comparable(self)
  property seconds = 0i64
  
  def initialize(@seconds)
  end
  
  def initialize(h, m, s)
    @seconds = h * 3600 + m * 60 + s
  end
  
  def initialize(str : String)
    nums = str.split('|').map(&.to_i64)
    hours = nums[0]
    minutes = nums[1]
    @seconds = nums[2] + minutes*60 + hours * 3600
  end
  
  def <=>(other : self)
    @seconds <=> other.seconds
  end
  
  def <=>(other)
    nil
  end
  
  def -(other : self)
    Result.new(@seconds - other.seconds)
  end
  
  def +(other : self)
    Result.new(@seconds + other.seconds)
  end
  
  def /(other)
    Result.new(@seconds / other)
  end
  
  def to_s(io)
    io << sprintf("%02d|%02d|%02d", @seconds/3600, (@seconds%3600) / 60, @seconds%60)
  end
  
  def self.zero
    new 0i64
  end
end

def stat_assoc(strg)
  return "" if strg.empty?
  results = strg.split(/,\s*/).map &->Result.new(String)
  minmax = results.minmax
  range = minmax.last - minmax.first
  
  mean = results.sum / results.size
  
  results.sort!
  
  med = results.size / 2
  median = if results.size.even?
    (results[med - 1] + results[med]) / 2
  else
    results[med]
  end
  
  "Range: #{range} Average: #{mean} Median: #{median}"
end

def stat_assoc(strg)
  return strg if strg.blank?
  times = strg.split(", ").map(&.split("|").map(&.to_i))
  .map{ |t| t[0].hours + t[1].minutes + t[2].seconds }.sort
  
  range = times.max - times.min
  mean = times.sum / times.size
	idx = (times.size - 1) / 2.0
  median = (times[idx.floor.to_i] + times[idx.ceil.to_i]) / 2.0

  "Range: #{time_to_string range} Average: #{time_to_string mean} Median: #{time_to_string median}"
end

def time_to_string(t : Time::Span)
  "%02d|%02d|%02d" % {t.hours, t.minutes, t.seconds}
end

def stat_assoc(strg)
  return strg if strg == ""
  times = strg.split(", ").map{ |t| t.split "|" }
  .map{ |t| Time.utc(2001,1,1, t[0].to_i, t[1].to_i, t[2].to_i) }
  
  range = times.max - times.min
  mean = Time.epoch(times.map{ |t| t.epoch }.sum / times.size).time_of_day
  if times.size % 2 == 1
	  median = times.sort.[(times.size / 2).to_i].time_of_day
  else
	  m1 = times.sort.[(times.size / 2 - 1).to_i].time_of_day
	  m2 = times.sort.[(times.size / 2).to_i].time_of_day
    median = (m1 + m2) / 2
  end
  
  "Range: #{time_to_string range} Average: #{time_to_string mean} Median: #{time_to_string median}"
end

def time_to_string(t : Time::Span)
  p = ->(i : Int32) {i.to_s.rjust 2,'0'}
  "#{p.call t.hours}|#{p.call t.minutes}|#{p.call t.seconds}"
end

require "big"

def is_ore(n)
  factors = [] of Int32
  (1..Math.sqrt(n)).each do |i|
    if n % i == 0
      factors << i
      factors << n / i unless i * i == n
    end
  end
  (factors.size / factors.reduce(BigRational.new(0)) { |s, n| s + BigRational.new(1, n) }).denominator == 1
end

def is_ore(n : Int32)
        divisor_count = 1
        divisor_sum = 1 + n
        i = 2
        half_n = Math.sqrt(n)
        while i <= half_n
                if (n % i) == 0
                        divisor_count += 1
                        divisor_sum += (i + n / i)
                end
                i = i.+ 1
        end
        if ((2 * divisor_count * n) % divisor_sum) == 0
                true
        else
                false
        end
end

def scramble(s1, s2)
  ht = {} of Char => Int32
  s1.each_char{|c| ht[c]=(ht[c]? || 0)+1}
  s2.each_char do |c|
    ht[c] = (ht[c]? || 0)-1
    return false if ht[c] < 0
  end
  true
end

def get_letters(s : String) : Hash(Char, Int32)
	letters = Hash(Char, Int32).new

	s.each_char do |c|
		if letters.has_key?(c)
			letters[c] += 1
		else
			letters[c] = 1
		end
	end

	return letters
end

def scramble(s1 : String, s2 : String) : Bool
	s1Letters = get_letters(s1)
	s2Letters = get_letters(s2)

	s2.each_char do |c|
		if s1Letters.has_key?(c)
			if s1Letters[c] < s2Letters[c]
				return false
			end
		else
			return false
		end
	end

	return true
end

def scramble(s1,s2)
  c1 = [0] * 128
  c2 = [0] * 128
  s1.each_byte do |c|
    c1[c] += 1
  end
  s2.each_byte do |c|
    c2[c] += 1
  end
  (65_u8..122_u8).all?{|c|
    c1[c] >= c2[c]
  }
end

def scramble(s1,s2)
  word = {} of Char => Int32
  
  s2.each_char do |c|
    count = word.has_key?(c) ? word[c] : 0
    word[c] = count + 1
  end
  
  return true if word.empty?
  
  s1.each_char do |c|
    next unless word.has_key?(c)
    word.delete(c) if (word[c] -= 1) <= 0
    break if word.empty?
  end
  
  word.empty?
end

def scramble(s1, s2)
    cnt = Array.new 26, 0
    s2.chars.each do |c|
        cnt[c.ord - 'a'.ord] += 1
    end
    tot = cnt.sum
    s1.chars.each do |c|
        i = c.ord - 'a'.ord
        if cnt[i] > 0
            cnt[i] -= 1
            tot -= 1
            if tot == 0
                return true
            end
        end
    end
    false
end

def race(v1, v2, g)
  return [-1,-1,-1] if v1 > v2
  hr, min, sec = 1, 0, 0
  vh1, vh2 = v1 + g, v2
  while vh1 > vh2
    vh1 += v1
    vh2 += v2
    hr += 1
  end
  if vh1.round(4) == vh2.round(4)
    return [hr, min, sec]
  else
    vh1 -= v1
    vh2 -= v2
    hr -= 1
  end
  vm1, vm2 = v1 / 60.0, v2 / 60.0
  while vh1 > vh2
    vh1 += vm1
    vh2 += vm2
    min += 1
  end
  if vh1.round(4) == vh2.round(4)
    if min == 60
      hr += 1
      min = 0
    end
    return [hr, min, sec]
  else
    vh1 -= vm1
    vh2 -= vm2
    min -= 1
  end
  vs1, vs2 = v1 / 3600.0, v2 / 3600.0
  while vh1 > vh2
    vh1 += vs1
    vh2 += vs2
    sec += 1
  end
  sec -= 1 unless vh1.round(4) == vh2.round(4)
  if sec == 60
    min += 1
    sec = 0
  end
  [hr, min, sec]
end

    a = ls.combinations(k).to_a
    mx = -1
    res = [] of Int32
    a.each do |l|
        s = l.reduce(0){ |sum, x| sum + x }
        if ((s >= mx) && (s <= t))

def prod2sum(a, b, c, d)
   l1 = [(a * c + b * d).abs, (a * d - b * c).abs].sort
   l2 = [(a * c - b * d).abs, (a * d + b * c).abs].sort
   if l1 == l2

def tankvol(h, d, vt)
  n = Math.acos(1.0 - h.to_f / (d.to_f / 2.0)) * 2.0
  (vt * (n - Math.sin(n)) / (2.0 * 3.14159265358979323846)).floor
end

def tankvol(h, d, vt)
  r = d / 2
  (r.abs2 * Math.acos((r-h)/r) - (r-h) * Math.sqrt(2 * r * h - h.abs2)) * vt / (Math::PI * r.abs2) // 1
end

def tankvol(h, d, vt)
  r = d / 2
  th = r - h # Triangle height
  circle = Math::PI * r.abs2
  sector = r.abs2 * Math.acos(th / r)
  triangle = th * Math.sqrt(r.abs2 - th.abs2)
  depth = vt / circle
  puts({r, th, circle, sector, triangle, depth})
  (depth * (sector - triangle)).floor
end

def tankvol(h, d, vt)
    if (h == 0)
    	return 0 
  	end
    # radius
    h = h.to_f
    r = d / 2.0
    if (h == r) 
    	return vt // 2 
  	end
    if (h == d) 
    	return vt 
  	end
    # height > radius, calculate with d - h and at the end change the volume
    if (h > r)
        h = d - h
        hilevel = true
    else
        hilevel = false
    end
    # total area of circle
    st = Math::PI * r * r
    # half angle from the center
    theta = Math.acos((r - h) / r)
    sr = (r - h) * Math.sqrt(r * r - (r - h) ** 2)
    # area corresponding to angle 2 * theta
    sa = st / Math::PI * theta
    # surface corresponding to the height
    sh = sa - sr
    # volume to find corresponding to surface of liquid / total surface
    v = vt * sh / st
    if (hilevel)
        v = vt - v
    end
    v.to_i
end

def tankvol(h, d, v)
  r = d / 2
  t = Math.acos(1-h/r)
  ((v/(3.14159265*r**2))*(t*r**2 - r*Math.sin(t)*(r-h)))//1
end

def tankvol(h, d, vt) : Int
  r = 0.5 * d
  section_area = r ** 2 * Math.acos(1 - h / r) - (r - h) * Math.sqrt(h * (d - h))
  full_section_area = Math::PI * r * r
  (vt * section_area / full_section_area).to_i
end

HASH = {1 => 45, 2 => 54, 3 => 495, 4 => 594}

def sum_diff(a)
  return false if a.to_s[-1] == '0' || a.to_s[0] == '0'
  (a.to_s.reverse.to_i + a) % (a.to_s.reverse.to_i - a).abs == 0 rescue false
end

def sum_dif_rev(n)
  unless (HASH[n] rescue false)
    k, v = HASH.max
    loop do
      if sum_diff(v += 1)
        HASH[k += 1] = v
      end
      break if k > n
    end
  end
  return HASH[n] 
end

class SdrMemo
  @@memo = Array(Int32).new
  
  def self.memo
    @@memo
  end
end

def rev(n)
  r = 0
  while n > 0
    r = r*10 + n%10
    n //= 10
  end
  r
end

def sum_dif_rev(n)
  nth = SdrMemo.memo[n-1]?
  return nth if !nth.nil?
  
  i = SdrMemo.memo.empty? ? 44 : SdrMemo.memo.last
  while SdrMemo.memo.size < n
    i += 1
    if i%10 != 0
      r = rev i
      if r < i && SdrMemo.memo.includes? r
        SdrMemo.memo << i
      elsif r != i && (r+i) % (r-i) == 0
        SdrMemo.memo << i
      end
    end
  end
  i
end

class Memo
  @@memo = [] of Int32

  def self.find_next
    n = @@memo.empty? ? 0 : @@memo.last
    loop {
      n += 9
      next if n % 10 == 0
      nrev = n.to_s.reverse.to_i
      next if n == nrev
      if (n + nrev) % (n - nrev).abs == 0
        @@memo.push(n)
        return
      end
    }
  end
  
  def self.find(n)
    while @@memo.size < n
      find_next 
    end
    @@memo[n-1]
  end
end

def sum_dif_rev(n)
  Memo.find(n)
end

def good(n)
  inv = n.to_s.chars.reverse.join("").to_i
  return n != inv && (n + inv) % (inv - n).abs == 0 && inv.to_s.size == n.to_s.size
end

    i += 1
    if good(i)
      LIST << i
    end
  end
  return LIST[n-1]
end

def prime?(n)
  (2..Math.sqrt(n) + 1).each do |i|
    if n % i == 0
      return false
    end
  end
  n > 1
end

def step(g : Int32, m : Int32, n : Int32)
  (m..n - g).each do |i|
    if prime?(i) && prime?(i + g)
      return [i, i + g]
    end
  end
  return
end

def prime?(n : Int32)
  return (n > 1) if n <= 3
  return false if (n % 2) == 0 || (n % 3) == 0
  
  i = 5
  
  while (i * i) <= n
    return false if (n % i) == 0 || (n % (i + 2)) == 0
    i += 6
  end
  
  true
end

def step(g : Int32, m : Int32, n : Int32)
  m.upto(n) do |i|
    j = i + g
    
    break if j > n
    return [i,j] if prime?(i) && prime?(j)
  end
  
  nil
end

def is_prime?(n)
  return n == 2 if n <= 2 || n % 2 == 0
  (3..Math.sqrt(n)).each do |i|
    return false if n % i == 0
  end
  true
end
def step(g, m, n)
  primes = [] of Int32
  (m..n).each do |i|
    if is_prime?(i)
      primes.each do |p|
        return [p, i] if i - p == g
      end
      primes << i
    end
  end
  nil
end

struct Number
  def prime?
    return false if self <= 1
    return true if self <= 3
    return false if divisible_by?(2) || divisible_by?(3)
    i = 5
    while i * i <= self
      return false if divisible_by?(i) || divisible_by?(i + 2)
      i += 6
    end
    true
  end
end

def step(gap : Int32, start : Int32, stop : Int32)
  start.upto(stop) do |start_prime|
    next unless start_prime.prime?
    stop_prime = start_prime + gap
    return [start_prime, stop_prime] if stop_prime.prime? # Should return a tuple
  end    
end

def step(g : Int32, m : Int32, n : Int32)
    # puts "g=#{g} m=#{m} n=#{n}"

    (m ... n).map { |k|
      if is_prime(k) 
        prev = primes_seen.find { |p| k - p == g }
        if prev

        else

      end
    }
    nil
end

end

    name1 = a[0].as(String)
    name2 = b[0].as(String)
    w1 = a[1].as(Int32)

    w2 < w1 ? -1 : w2 > w1 ? 1 : name1 <=> name2
end

     st.empty? ? "No participants" : n > we.size ? "Not enough participants" : st.split(",").map_with_index{|x, i| [x, we[i] * (x.size + x.downcase.chars.sum{|c| c.ord - 96})]}.sort{|x, y| comp(x, y)}[n - 1][0]
end

def rank(st, we, n)
  return "No participants" if st.empty?
  
  ns = st.split(",").compact
  return "Not enough participants" if n > ns.size

  d = ("a".."z")
  r = ns.map { |name| [name, (name.downcase.chars.map { |c| (d.index(c.to_s) || 0) + 1 }.sum + name.size) * we[ns.index(name) || 0]] }
  r.sort_by { |w| {-w[1].to_i, w[0].to_s} }[n - 1][0]
end

def rank(st, we, n)
  return "No participants" if st.empty?
  s = st.split ","
  return "Not enough participants" if n > s.size
  rm = Hash(Int32, Int32).new
  r = [] of Int32
  s.size.times do |i|
    rm[i] = (s[i].size + s[i].chars.sum{|c| c.downcase - '`'}) * we[i]
    r << rm[i]
  end
  r.sort!.reverse!
  names = Array(String).new
  f = -1
  s.size.times do |i|
    if rm[i] == r[n-1]
      names << s[i]
    end
    if r[i] == r[n-1]
      if f < 0
        f = i
      end
    end
  end
  if names.size == 1
    names.first
  else
    names.sort[n-f-1]
  end
end

def rank(st, we, n)
    return "No participants" if st.empty?
    participants = st.split(',')
    return "Not enough participants" if n > participants.size
    alpha = ('a'..'z').to_a
    results = [] of {String, Int32}
    participants.each_with_index do |p, i|
      sum_of_letters = p.downcase.chars.map {|c| alpha.index(c).not_nil! + 1}.sum
      wp = (sum_of_letters + p.size) * we[i]
      results << {p, wp}
    end
    results.sort {|x,y| compare(x,y)}.reverse[n - 1].first
end

def compare (n1 : {String,Int32}, n2 : {String,Int32})
  return n1[1] <=> n2[1] unless n1[1] == n2[1]
  return n2[0] <=> n1[0]
end

def self.gap(g : Int32, m : Int32, n : Int32)
    result = [] of Int32
    prime_numbers = [] of Int32

    (m..n).each do |i|
        is_divisible = false

        j = 2
        while j <= sqrt(i)
            if i % j == 0
                is_divisible = true
                break
            end
            j += 1
        end

        if !is_divisible
            prime_numbers.push(i)
        end

        if prime_numbers.size >= 2
            if prime_numbers[-1] - prime_numbers[-2] == g
                result.push(prime_numbers[-2])
                result.push(prime_numbers[-1])
                return result
            end
        end
    end

    return nil
end

class Tmp
  @@max_an : Array(Int32)
  @@max_gn : Array(Int32)

  @@max_n = 500000
  @@max_an = p_an(@@max_n)
  @@max_gn = p_gn(@@max_n)

  def self.max_n
    @@max_n
  end

  def self.max_an
    @@max_an
  end

  def self.max_gn
    @@max_gn
  end

  def self.grow_col(n)
    if n > @@max_n
      puts "===grow(#{n})"
      @@max_n = (n * 1.5).to_i
      @@max_an = self.p_an(@@max_n)
      @@max_gn = self.p_gn(@@max_n)
    end
  end

  def self.gcd(n, m)
    return n if m == 0
    self.gcd(m, n % m)
  end

  def self.p_an(n)
    return [] of Int32 if n <= 0
    res = [7]
    (2..n).each do |i|
      an1 = res[-1]
      res << an1 + self.gcd(i, an1)
    end
    res
  end

  def self.p_gn(n)
    return [] of Int32 if n <= 0
    res = [] of Int32
    prev = 0
    @@max_an.each_with_index do |v, i|
      if i == 0
        res << 1
      else
        res << v - prev
      end
      prev = v
    end
    res
  end
end

def an(n)
  if n > Tmp.max_n
    Tmp.grow_col(n)
  end
  Tmp.max_an[0, n]
end

def gn(n)
  if n > Tmp.max_n
    Tmp.grow_col(n)
  end
  Tmp.max_gn[0, n]
end

def len_curve(n)
  h = 1 / n
  x = y = l = 0
  (1..n).each do |i|
    i = i * h
    l += Math.hypot(x - i, y - i * i)
    x = i
    y = i * i
  end
  l
end

require "math";

def ex_euler(n)
  x, y, h = 0.0, 1.0, 1.0/n
  
  errs = (1 .. n).map { |k|
      t = k * h
      zk = 1.0 + 0.5 * Math.exp( -4 * t ) - 0.5 * Math.exp( -2 * t )
      y += h * (2 - Math.exp( -4* (t-h) ) - 2 * y )
      (y - zk).abs / zk 
  }
  
  ((errs.sum / (n+1)) * 1e6).floor / 1e6
end

def f(t, y)
    2 - Math.exp(-4 * t) - 2 * y
end
def ex_euler(n)
    # initial conditions
    t0 = 0.0; y0 = 1.0; # pt A0
    t = 1.0; 
    # variables
    h = t / n.to_f; xtab = [t0]; ytab = [y0]; ztab = [] of Float64; rtab = [] of Float64
    # points A1 ... An
    k = 0
    while (k < n)
        xtab << (k + 1) * h
        ytab << ytab[k] + h * f(xtab[k], ytab[k])
        k += 1
    end
    # pts on the exact curve
    k = 0
    while (k < n + 1)
        # exact solution
        ztab << 1 + 0.5 * Math.exp(-4 * xtab[k]) - 0.5 * Math.exp(-2 * xtab[k])
        # relative error
        rtab << (ytab[k] - ztab[k]).abs / ztab[k]
        k += 1
    end
    res = (rtab.reduce(0){ |sum, x| sum + x }) / (n + 1)
    return (res * 1e6).floor / 1e6  
end

def f(t, y)
    2 - Math.exp(-4 * t) - 2 * y
end
def ex_euler(n)
    # initial conditions
    t0 = 0.0; y0 = 1.0; # pt A0
    t = 1.0; 
    # variables
    h = t / n.to_f; xtab = [t0]; ytab = [y0]; ztab = [] of Float64; rtab = [] of Float64
    # points A1 ... An
    k = 0
    while (k < n)
        xtab << (k + 1) * h
        ytab << ytab[k] + h * f(xtab[k], ytab[k])
        k += 1
    end
    # pts on the exact curve
    k = 0
    while (k < n + 1)
        # exact solution
        ztab << 1 + 0.5 * Math.exp(-4 * xtab[k]) - 0.5 * Math.exp(-2 * xtab[k])
        # relative error
        rtab << (ytab[k] - ztab[k]).abs / ztab[k]
        k += 1
    end
    res = (rtab.reduce(0){ |sum, x| sum + x }) / (n + 1)
    return (res * 1e6).floor / 1e6  
end

def fcn(n)
  case n
  when 0 then 1
  when 1 then 2
  else
    a, b = BigInt.new(1), BigInt.new(2)
    i = 1
    while i < n
      a, b = b, (6 * a * b) // (5 * a - b)
      i += 1
    end
    b
  end
end

def fcn(n)
  a = BigInt.new(1)
  b = BigInt.new(2)
  
  n.times do
    c = BigInt.new(6) * a * b / (BigInt.new(5) * a - b)
    a, b = b, c
  end
  
  a
end

  return Int64.new(2) ** n
end

def thirt(n)
  while true
    s,r,m = 0,1,n
    while m>0
      s+=m%10*r
      m=(m/10).to_i
      r=(10*r)%13
    end
    return s if s==n
    n=s
  end
end

def thirt(n)
  arr=[1,10,9,12,3,4]
  while n>=100
    sum=0
    test=n
    i=0
    while test != 0
      sum += (test%10)*arr[i%6]
      test = (test/10).floor
      i+=1
    end
    n=sum
  end
  n
end

def thirt(n : Int32)
    seq = [ 1, 10, 9, 12, 3, 4 ]
    m = n.to_s.chars.reverse.map_with_index{|v, i| v.to_i*seq[i%6]}.sum
    m == n ? n : thirt(m)
end

def thirt(n)
  m = [1, 10, 9, 12, 3, 4]
  mi = 0
  sum = 0
  digits = n
  while digits > 0
    digit = digits % 10
    digits = digits // 10
    sum = sum + (digit * m[mi])
    mi = (mi + 1) % 6
  end
  (sum == n) ? sum : thirt(sum)
end

def thirt(n, last=0)
    digits = n.to_s.chars.map(&.to_i)
    s = digits.reverse.zip([1, 10, 9, 12, 3, 4].cycle).map{|x, y| x*y}.sum
    if s == last
      return s
    else
      return thirt(s, s)
    end
end

def thirt(n)
    w = [1, 10, 9, 12, 3, 4]
    while true
        r = n; q = -1; c = 0; j = 0
        while (q != 0)
            q = r // 10
            c += (r % 10) * w[j % 6]
            r = q
            j += 1
        end
        if (c == n) 
      		return c 
    	end
        n = c
    end
end

def thirt(n)
  old_sum = partial_sum n

  loop do
    old_sum = partial_sum old_sum
    new_sum = partial_sum old_sum

    break old_sum if old_sum == new_sum
  end
end

def partial_sum(n)
  n.to_s
    .reverse
    .each_char
    .map(&.to_i)
    .zip([1, 10, 9, 12, 3, 4].cycle)
    .map { |(x, y)| x * y }
    .sum
end

def fortune(f, p, c, n, i)
  while n > 1
    f = (f + p / 100 * f - c).floor
    c = (c + i / 100 * c).floor
    return false if f < 0
    n -= 1
  end
  true
end

def fortune(f, p, c, n, i)
  (1...n).each_with_object([f, c]) do |_, obj|
    obj[0] += (obj[0] * (p / 100.0)).to_i - obj[1]
    obj[1] += (obj[1] * (i / 100.0)).to_i
  end.first >= 0
end

def fortune(f0, p, c0, n, i)
    f = f0
    c = c0
    pp = p == 0 ? 0 : p.to_f/100
    ii = i == 0 ? 0 : i.to_f/100
    m = n - 1
    while m > 0
      f += (pp * f - c).floor().to_i
      c += (ii * c).floor().to_i
      m -= 1
    end
    return f >= 0
end

def fortune(f, p, c, n, i)
  p /= 100.0
  i /= 100.0
  (n - 1).times do
    f += (f * p - c).floor
    c += (c * i).floor
  end
  f >= 0
end

def fortune(f, p, c, n, i)
  count = 0
  while f > 0
    puts f
    f = ((f + f*(p/100_f32)) - c).round 0
    c = (c + (c * (i/100_f32))).round 0
    count += 1
  end
  count >= n
end

def f(x)
	1.5 * Math.sin(x)**3
end
def simpson(n)
    h = Math::PI / n.to_f
    s1 = 0
    (1..n / 2).each do |i|
        s1 += f((2 * i - 1) * h)
    end
    s2 = 0
    (1..n / 2 - 1).each do |i|
        s2 += f(2 * i * h)
    end
    res = Math::PI / (3 * n) * (f(0) + f(Math::PI) + 4 * s1 + 2 * s2)
end

	1.5 * Math.sin(x)**3
end

    h = Math::PI / n.to_f
    s1 = 0
    (1..n / 2).each do |i|
        s1 += f((2 * i - 1) * h)
    end
    s2 = 0
    (1..n / 2 - 1).each do |i|
        s2 += f(2 * i * h)
    end
    res = Math::PI / (3 * n) * (f(0) + f(Math::PI) + 4 * s1 + 2 * s2)
end

def simpson(n)
    f = ->(x : Float64) { 1.5 * Math.sin(x)**3 }
    h = Math::PI / n.to_f
    s1 = 0
    (1..n / 2).each do |i|
        s1 += f.call((2 * i - 1) * h)
    end
    s2 = 0
    (1..n / 2 - 1).each do |i|
        s2 += f.call(2 * i * h)
    end
    res = Math::PI / (3 * n) * (f.call(0.0) + f.call(Math::PI) + 4 * s1 + 2 * s2)
end

def number_format(n)
  return "-#{number_format(-n)}" if n < 0
  return "#{number_format(n / 1000)},#{"%03i" % (n % 1000)}" if n >= 1000
  n.to_s
end

def number_format(n)
  f = n.abs.to_s.reverse.gsub(/.{1,3}/, "\\0,").rchop.reverse
  n < 0 ? "-#{f}" : f
end

def number_format(n)
  f = n.abs.to_s.reverse.each_char.in_groups_of(3).map(&.join).join(",").reverse
  n < 0 ? "-#{f}" : f
end

def number_format(n)
  num_arr = n.to_s.chars.reverse
  res = [] of Char
  cnt = 0
  
  num_arr.each do |x|
    if x.hex?
      if cnt % 3 == 0 && cnt != 0
        res << ','
      end
      cnt += 1
      res << x
    end
  end
  
  if n < 0
    res << '-'
  end
  
  (res.map { |x| x }.join).reverse
end

def mxdiflg(a1, a2)
  return -1 if a1.empty? || a2.empty?
  min1, max1 = a1.map{|s| s.size}.minmax
  min2, max2 = a2.map{|s| s.size}.minmax
  [max1 - min2, max2 - min1].max
end

def mxdiflg(a1, a2)
  first = a1.map(&.size)
  second = a2.map(&.size)
  a1.empty? || a2.empty? ? -1 : [first.max - second.min, second.max - first.min].max
end

def mxdiflg(a1, a2)
  # your code
  if a1.empty? || a2.empty?
    return -1
  end

  a1mima = a1.map { |s| s.size }.minmax
  a2mima = a2.map { |s| s.size }.minmax
  
  return [ a2mima.max - a1mima.min, a1mima.max - a2mima.min ].max
end

def mxdiflg(a1, a2)
  if a1.size == 0 || a2.size == 0
    return -1
  end
  a=0
  a1.each do |s1|
    l=s1.size
    a2.each do |s2|
      a=[a,(l-s2.size).abs].max
    end
  end
  a
end

def mxdiflg(s1, s2)
    if s1.size < 1 || s2.size < 1
        return -1
    end

    s1_mapped = s1.map{|str| str.size}
    s2_mapped = s2.map{|str| str.size}

    s1_max = s1_mapped.max
    s1_min = s1_mapped.min
    s2_max = s2_mapped.max
    s2_min = s2_mapped.min

    diff_1 = (s1_max - s2_min).abs
    diff_2 = (s1_min - s2_max).abs

    return diff_1 > diff_2 ? diff_1 : diff_2
end

def mxdiflg(a1, a2)
  return -1 if a1.empty? || a2.empty?
  mn1 = a1.min_of(&.size)
  mx1 = a1.max_of(&.size)
  mn2 = a2.min_of(&.size)
  mx2 = a2.max_of(&.size)
  [mx1 - mn2, mx2 - mn1].max
end

def mxdiflg(a1, a2) : Int32
  return -1 if a1.empty? || a2.empty?
  ashort, along = min_max(a1)
  bshort, blong = min_max(a2)
  a = (along - bshort).abs
  b = (blong - ashort).abs
  a > b ? a : b
end

def min_max(a) : Array(Int32)
  min = Int32::MAX
  max = 0_i32
  a.each do |str|
    size = str.size
    if size < min
      min = size
    end
    
    if size > max
      max = size
    end
  end
  [min, max]
end

566543703c72200f0b0000c9.body:
def epidemic(tm, n, s0, i0, b, a)
  s = s0.to_f64
  i = i0.to_f64
  r = 0.to_f64
  t = 0.to_f64
  dt = tm.to_f64 / n.to_f64
  imax = 0.to_f64
  while t<tm.to_f64
    sd = dt*(-b*s*i)
    id = dt*(b*s*i-a*i)
    rd = dt*(a*i)
    s += sd
    i += id
    r += rd
    t += dt
    if i.floor>imax
      imax = i.floor
    end
  end
  imax.to_i
end

def epidemic(tm, n, s0, i0, b, a)
  dt = tm / n.to_f
  s = [s0.to_f]; i = [i0.to_f]; r = [0.0]; t = [0.0]
  k = 0
  while (k < n)
    t << (k+1) * dt
    s << s[k] - dt * b * s[k] * i[k]
    i << i[k] + dt * (b * s[k] * i[k] - a * i[k])
    r << r[k] + dt * i[k] * a
    k += 1
  end
  i.max.round
end

def epidemic(tm, n, s0, i0, b, a)
    dt = tm/n.to_f
    s = [s0.to_f]; i = [i0.to_f]; r = [0.0]; t = [0.0]
    k = 0
    while (k < n)
        t << (k+1)*dt
        s << s[k] - dt*b*s[k]*i[k]
        i << i[k] + dt*(b*s[k]*i[k] - a*i[k])
        r << r[k] + dt*i[k]*a
        k += 1
    end
    i.max.to_i
end

def max_ball(v)
  h = ->(t : Float64){  (v * 1000 / 3600.0) * t - 0.5 * 9.81 * t ** 2 }
  oh = [0, 0.0]
  n = 1
  nh = [n, h.call(n / 10.0)]
  while nh[1] > oh[1]
    oh = nh
    n += 1
    nh = [n, h.call(n / 10.0)]
  end
  oh[0]
end

def max_ball(v0)
  v = v0 / 3.6
  previous_h = h = 0.0
  interval = 1.0 / 10
  t = 0.0
  tenth = 0

  until h < previous_h
    previous_h = h
    # Formula
    h = v * t - 0.5 * 9.81 * t * t

    t += interval
    tenth += 1
  end

  tenth - 2
end

def max_ball(v0)
  g = 9.81
  v = v0 / 3.6
  t = 0
  h_old = 0
  h_new = 0
  stop = 0
  while (h_new - h_old) >= 0
    h_old, h_new = h_new, v*t - 0.5*g*t*t
    t += 0.1
    stop += 1
  end
  stop - 2
end

def nb_dig(n : UInt64, d)
  cnt = 0
  nums = (0..n).map {|k| k * k}
  nums.each do |num|
    sn = num.to_s
      sn.each_char do |s|
        if (s.to_i == d)
          cnt += 1 
        end 
      end
    end
    cnt
end

def nb_dig(n : UInt64, d)
  m = 0
  (1..n).each{|k|
    x = k * k
    while x > 0
      r = x % 10
      x = (x / 10).to_i
      m += 1 if r == d
    end
  }
  m += 1 if d == 0
  m
end

def nb_dig(n : UInt64, d)
  count = 0
  i = 0
  
  while i <= n
    square = i*i
  
    while true
      last_digit = square % 10
      square = square // 10

      if last_digit == d
        count += 1
      end
      
      if square == 0
        break
      end
    end
  
    i += 1
  end

  count
end

def nb_dig(n : UInt64, d : Int) : Int32
  (0..n).sum(&.**(2).digits.count(d))
end

def nb_dig(n : UInt64, d)
  c = d.zero? ? 1 : 0
  k = 1
  while k <= n
    c += (k*k).to_s.count d.to_s
    k += 1
  end
  c
end

  elsif p1 == "scissors" && p2 == "paper"

def find_even_index(arr)
  scan = arr.dup
  n = arr.size
  return 0 if n == 0
  (1...n).each do |i|
    scan[i] += scan[i-1]
  end
  scan.insert 0, 0
  (0...n).each do |i|
    return i if scan[-1] - scan[i+1] == scan[i]
  end
  return -1
end

  end
  date.to_s("%Y-%m-%d")

  pd = p.to_f / 36000
  c = 0
  while true

    c += 1
    break if a <= a0
  end
  (Time.new(2016, 1, 1) + c.days).to_s("%F")
end

def town(town, strng)
  st = strng.split("
").find { |x| x.split(":")[0] == town }
  return [] of Nil unless st

  st.split(",").map { |x| x.split(" ")[1].to_f }
end

def mean(town, strng)
  st = town(town, strng).compact
  return -1 if st.empty?

  st.reduce(0.0){ |sum, x|  sum += x } / st.size
end

def variance(town, strng)
  st = town(town, strng).compact
  return -1 if st.empty?
  
  mean = st.reduce(0.0){ |sum, x|  sum += x } / st.size
  st.reduce(0.0) { |res, x| res += ( mean - x ) ** 2 } / st.size
end

def data_for(town, data)
  data
    .lines
    .find(""){|line| line.starts_with?(town+":") }
    .scan(/[\-\d\.]+/)
    .map(&.[0].to_f)
end

def mean(town, data)
  samples = data_for(town, data)
  return -1 if samples.empty?
  samples.sum / samples.size 
end

def variance(town, data)
  samples = data_for(town, data)
  return -1 if samples.empty?
  e = samples.sum / samples.size
  samples.map{|x| (x-e) ** 2}.sum / samples.size
end

def max_rot(n : Int64) : Int64
    n = n.to_s
    lst = [n]
    while lst.size <= n.size
      n = n[0...lst.size - 1] + n[lst.size..-1] + n[lst.size - 1]
      lst << n
    end
    lst.max.to_i64
end

def max_rot(n : Int64) : Int64
  s = n.to_s
  nums = [n]
  s.size.times do |i|
    s = s[0...i] + s[i+1..-1] + s[i]
    nums << s.to_i64
  end
  nums.max
end

def max_rot(n : Int64) : Int64
    s, res, mx = n.to_s, "", n
    if (s.size == 1) 
    	return n 
  	end
    while true
        s = (s * 2)[1, s.size]
        res += s[0]
        s = s[1, s.size]
        nb = (res + s).to_i64
        if (nb > mx) 
      		mx = nb 
    	end
        if (s.size == 1)
      		break 
    	end
    end
    mx
end

def max_rot(n : Int64) : Int64
  stg = n.to_s
  l = stg.size - 2
  max = n
  (1..l).reduce(stg[1..-1] + stg[0]) do |s, i|
    tmp = s.to_i64
    max = tmp if max < tmp
    s[0...i] + s[(i+1)..-1] + s[i]
  end
  max
end

def max_rot(n : Int64) : Int64
  return n if n.to_s.size == 1
  arr = [] of String
  arr << n.to_s
  s = n.to_s.split("").rotate.join
  arr << s
  i = 0
  while true
    arr << s[0..i] + s[(i + 1)..(s.size - 1)].split("").rotate.join
    s = s[0..i] + s[(i + 1)..(s.size - 1)].split("").rotate.join
    i += 1
    break if i == s.size - 1
  end
  arr.map { |x| x.to_i64 }.max
end

  return "" unless (1..strs.size).includes?(k)
  strs.each_cons(k).max_by(&.sum(&.size)).join
end

def longest_consec(strarr, k)
    if k <=0 || strarr.size < k
      return "" end
    longest = ""
  	strarr.size.times do |index_word|
      if index_word < strarr.size - k + 1
        current = ""
        k.times do |next_index_word|
          current += strarr[index_word + next_index_word] end
        if current.size > longest.size
          longest = current end
      end end
    return longest
end

def longest_consec(strarr, k)
  if k <= 0 || strarr.size == 0 || k > strarr.size
    return ""
  end

  slice_ar = Array(String).new
  strarr.each_cons (k) do |slice|
    slice_ar.push(slice.join(""))
  end
  slice_ar.reverse!
  slice_ar.[slice_ar.map { |s| s.size }.each_with_index.max[1]]
end

def longest_consec(strarr, k)
  	# Edge cases
    return "" if strarr.empty?
    return "" if k <= 0
    return "" if k > strarr.size

    strs = [] of String
    strarr.each_cons(k) do |cons|
      strs << cons.join
    end

    strs.max_by { |str| str.size }

end

def longest_consec(arr, k)
    m = ""
    if k <= 0
        return m 
    end
    i = 0
    while i+k <= arr.size
        n = arr[i...i+k].join("")
        if n.size > m.size
            m = n
        end
        i += 1
    end
    return m
end

        return m
    end
    i = 0
    while i+k <= arr.size
        n = arr[i, k].join("")
        if n.size > m.size
            m = n
        end
        i += 1
    end
    return m
end

def revrot(string, size)
  return "" if size <= 0 || string.empty?
  String.build do |io|
    string.chars.each_slice(size) do |slice|
      next if slice.size < size
      io << (slice.map(&.to_i.**(2)).sum.even? ? slice.reverse.join : slice.rotate.join)
    end
  end
end

def revrot(str, sz)
   if sz <= 0 || str.empty? || sz > str.size
     return ""
   end
   (0...str.size // sz).map{|a| str[a*sz...a*sz+sz]}.map{|x| x.chars.map{|y| y.to_i ** 3}.sum.even? ? x.reverse : x[1..-1] + x[0]}.join
end

def revrot(str, sz)
  return "" if str.empty? || sz <= 0 || sz > str.size
  
  r = str.each_char.each_slice(sz).reject(&.size.< sz).map do |c|
    c.map(&.to_i.** 3).sum.even? ? c.reverse : c.rotate
  end
  
  r.flatten.join
end

def revrot(str, sz)
  return "" if sz <= 0
  str.chars
    .in_groups_of(sz, '\0')
    .take_while { |g| !g.includes?('\0') }
    .map do |g|
      sum = g.map(&.to_i.**(3)).sum()
      (sum % 2 == 0 ? g.reverse : g.rotate).join
    end
    .join
end

def revrot(str, sz)
  return "" unless (ss = str.size) > sz > 0
  lim = -((ss % sz) + 1)
  str.bytes[0..lim].map(&.&(0xf)).in_groups_of(sz, 0).join do |chunk|
    (chunk.sum(&.**(2)) % 2 > 0 ? chunk.rotate : chunk.reverse).join
  end
end

def revrot(str, sz)
  return "" if sz > str.size || sz <= 0
  r = ""
  (str.size//sz).times do |i|
    s = str[i * sz, sz]
    if s.chars.sum {|c| c.to_i ** 2} % 2 == 0
      r += s.reverse
    else
      r += s[1, sz - 1] + s[0]
    end
  end
  r
end

def revrot(str : String, sz : Int32)
  return "" if str.empty? || sz <= 0 || sz > str.size
  pos = 0
  result = String.build do |s|
    while true
      chunk = str[pos, sz]
      break if chunk.size != sz
      chunk = is_reversible?(chunk) ? chunk.reverse : "#{chunk[1..-1]}#{chunk[0]}"
      s << chunk
      pos += sz
    end
  end
end

def is_reversible?(str : String)
  str.chars.reduce(0) { |sum, c| sum + c.to_i ** 3 }.even?
end

def phone(strng, num)
    # clean all
    clean = strng.gsub(/[^-0-9a-z\\\s+A-Z\\
<>.']/, " ")
    # search num
    a = clean.scan(/.*\+#{num}.*/).map{ |md| md[0].to_s }
    if (a.size > 1) 
        return "Error => Too many people: #{num}" end
    if (a.size == 0) 
        return "Error => Not found: #{num}" end
    # replace num 
    c = a[0].gsub(/\+#{num}/, "")
    # name
    name = c.scan(/<.*>/).map{ |md| md[0].to_s }[0]
    # address
    ad = c.gsub(/<.*>/, "").gsub(/\s+/, " ").strip()
    "Phone => " + num + ", Name => " + name[1...name.size-1] + ", Address => " + ad
end

def phone(strng, num)
  lines = strng.split("
").select(&.includes?(num))
  case lines.size
  when 0
    "Error => Not found: #{num}"
  when 1
    name = lines[0].match(/<([\w\s']+)>/).not_nil![1]
    address = lines[0].sub(num, "").sub("<#{name}>", "").gsub(/[^\w\s\-\.]/, " ").gsub(/[_\s]+/, " ")
    "Phone => #{num}, Name => #{name}, Address => #{address.strip}"
  else
    "Error => Too many people: #{num}"
  end
end

def phone(strng, num)
  rows = strng.split(/
/).select(/.*#{num}.*/)
  return "Error => Too many people: #{num}" if rows.size > 1
  return "Error => Not found: #{num}" if rows.empty?
  addr = rows[0].gsub(/.#{num}|<.*>|[!?$,:;\/\*]/, "").gsub(/[ _]+/, ' ').strip
  "Phone => #{num}, Name => #{rows[0][/<(.*)>/, 1]}, Address => #{addr}"
end

def get_name(s)
  s.match(/<(.+)>/).not_nil![1]
end

def get_address(s,num,name)
  s.sub(num,"").sub(name,"")
  .gsub(/[\+\<\>;\/\$\*\!\?,:]/,"")
  .gsub(/_/," ")
  .gsub(/\s+/, " ")
  .strip
end

def phone(strng, num)
  find_num = strng.lines.select { |l| l.index(num) }
  return "Error => Not found: #{num}" if find_num.size == 0
  return "Error => Too many people: #{num}" if find_num.size > 1
  name=get_name find_num.first
  "Phone => #{num}, Name => #{name}, Address => #{get_address(find_num.first,num,name)}"
end

def phone(strng, num)
  return "Error => Too many people: #{num}" if strng.scan(num).size > 1
  return "Error => Not found: #{num}" if strng.scan(num).size == 0
  strng.split('
').each do |l|
    if l.scan(num).size == 1
      m = l.match(/<(.*)>/).not_nil!
      return "Phone => #{num}, Name => #{m[1]}, Address => #{l.sub(num,"").sub(m[0],"").gsub(/[^[:alnum:] .-]/," ").gsub(/\s+/," ").strip}"
    end
  end
end

ERROR_TOO_MANY = "Error => Too many people: %s"
ERROR_NOT_FOUND = "Error => Not found: %s"
RESULT = "Phone => %s, Name => %s, Address => %s"

def phone(strng, num)
  lines = strng.lines.grep(%r(#{num}))
  case lines.size <=> 1
  when -1
    ERROR_NOT_FOUND % num
  when 1
    ERROR_TOO_MANY % num
  when 0
    RESULT % ({num} + extract_info(lines[0]))
  end
end

NAME = /<([\w' ]+)>/
PHONE = /\d{1,2}-\d{3}-\d{3}-\d{4}/
OTHER = /[^a-zA-Z0-9. -]/
def extract_info(line)
  name = line.match(NAME).try &.[1]
  address = line.gsub(NAME + PHONE, "").gsub(OTHER, " ").strip.squeeze(' ')
  {name, address}
end

def next_higher(n)
  a = (n + 1).to_s(2)
  n = n.to_s(2).count('1')  
  while n != a.count('1')
    a = (a.to_i(2) + 1).to_s(2)
  end
  a.to_i(2)
end

def next_higher(n)
  s=popcount(n)
  n+=1
  while popcount(n)!=s
    n+=1
  end
  n
end
def popcount(n)
  n.to_s(2).count('1')
end

def next_higher(n)
  return 0 if n == 0
  r = n & -n
  p = n + r
  q = (n ^ p) / (4 * r)
  p | q
end

def next_higher(n)
  f = n.popcount
  while f != (n+1).popcount
    n += 1
  end
  n+1
end

def next_higher(n)
  x = n+1
  while x.popcount != n.popcount
    x += 1
  end
  x
end

def next_higher(n)
  b = n.popcount
  c = n + 1
  loop do
    break if b == c.popcount
    c += 1
  end
  c
end

def next_higher(n)
  o = n & -n
  v = n + o
  p = (n ^ v) / o >> 2
  n.zero? ? 0 : v | p
end

56c30ad8585d9ab99b000c54.body:
def work_on_strings(a, b)
  a_freqs = a.downcase.chars.tally
  b_freqs = b.downcase.chars.tally
  a.chars.map { |c| flip_case(c, b_freqs) }.join + b.chars.map { |c| flip_case(c, a_freqs) }.join
end

def flip_case(c : Char, freqs : Hash(Char, Int32))
  return c if freqs.fetch(c.downcase, 0).divisible_by? 2
  return c.downcase if c.uppercase?
  c.upcase
end

class String
  def chars_with_odd_ct
    chars.each_with_object({} of Char => Int32) { | c, h |
      c = c.downcase
      h[c] = 0 unless h.has_key?(c)
      h[c] += 1 
    }.select { | _, ct | ct % 2 == 1 }.keys.join
  end
  
  def swapcase
    chars.map { | c | c.lowercase? ? c.upcase : c.downcase }.join
  end
end

def work_on_strings(a, b)
  acs = a.chars_with_odd_ct
  acs += acs.upcase
  bcs = b.chars_with_odd_ct
  bcs += bcs.upcase
  a.tr(bcs, bcs.swapcase) + b.tr(acs, acs.swapcase)
end

def arrange(strng)
  arr = strng.split
  (1...arr.size).each do |i|
    if i.odd? && arr[i].size < arr[i - 1].size || i.even? && arr[i].size > arr[i - 1].size 
      arr[i], arr[i - 1] = arr[i - 1], arr[i]   
    end
  end
  arr.map_with_index{|x, i| i.odd? ? x.upcase : x.downcase}.join(" ")
end

def arrange(strng)
  ar = strng.split
  (1...ar.size).step(2) do |i|
    ar[i-1], ar[i] = ar[i], ar[i-1] if ar[i-1].size > ar[i].size
    ar[i+1], ar[i] = ar[i], ar[i + 1] if i+1 < ar.size && ar[i+1].size > ar[i].size
  end
ar.map_with_index { |e, i| i.even? ? e.downcase : e.upcase }.join(' ')
end

56d3c1eb3323a88d0a000305.body:
LETTERS = "Superman".downcase.chars
MISS = "Are you crazy?"
HIT = "Hi, SuperMan!"

def find_SuperMan(s)
  str = s.downcase.chars
  indices = str.map{|c| LETTERS.index(c) }
  [indices, indices.reverse].each do |arr|
    start = arr.index(7) || arr.index(0)
    next if !start
    finish = arr.index(7, start + 1) || arr.index(0, start + 1)
    next if !finish
    chunk = arr[start..finish]
    sum = arr[start..finish].select{|v| v != nil}.map(&.not_nil!).sum
    next if sum != 28
    valid = chunk.each_cons(2).to_a.all? {|pair| pair.any?{|v| v == nil}}
    return HIT if valid
  end
  MISS
end

def make_valley(arr)
  a = arr.sort.reverse; l = [] of Int32; r = [] of Int32
  a.each_with_index do |v,i|
    if i.even?
      l << v
    else
      r << v
    end
  end
  [l, r.reverse].flatten  
end

def make_valley(arr)
  arr.sort!.reverse!
  odds = [] of Int32
  evens = [] of Int32
  arr.each_with_index do |x, i|
    evens << x if i.even?
    odds << x if i.odd?
  end
  evens + odds.reverse!  
end

def make_valley(arr)
  xs = arr.sort{|a,b|a<=>b}
  ys = arr.map{|_|0}
  n = xs.size
  j = n >> 1
  dx = n%2 == 0 ? -1 : 1
  (0...n).each{|i|
    ys[j] = xs[i]
    j+=dx
    dx*=-1
    dx+=dx>0 ? 1 : -1
  }
  ys
end

def make_valley(arr)
  result = [] of Int32
  arr = arr.sort
  if arr.size % 2 == 1
    result << arr[0]
    arr = arr[1..]
  end
  arr.each_with_index do |x, i|
    if i % 2 == 0
      result << x
    else
      result.unshift(x)
    end
  end
  result
end

def make_valley(arr)
  return arr if arr.size < 2
  ar = arr.sort
  st = ar.size.even? ? :l : :r
  ret = [ar.shift]
  until ar.empty?
    st == :l ? ret.unshift(ar.shift) : ret << ar.shift
    st = st == :l ? :r : :l
  end
  ret
end

def make_valley(arr)
  arr.sort!.reverse!
  l, r = Array(Int32).new, Array(Int32).new
  until arr.size <= 1
    l << arr.first
    arr.shift
    r << arr.first
    arr.shift
  end
  return l + arr + r.reverse
end

def make_valley(arr)
  res = [] of Int32
  a = arr.sort
  (1..arr.size).each do |x|
    res << a[x-1] if x.odd?
    res.insert(0, a[x-1]) if x.even?
  end
  return res.reverse if arr.size.odd?
  res
end

def easyline(n : UInt64)
  l = [1_u64] of UInt64
  (1..n).to_a.each do |k|
    l.push((n-k+1)*l.last/k)
  end
  return l.map{|i| i**2}.sum
end

require "big"

def factorial(n : BigFloat)
  n == 0 ? 1 : n * factorial(n - 1)
end

def binom(n : BigFloat, k : BigFloat)
  factorial(n) / (factorial(n - k) * (factorial k))
end

def easyline(n : UInt64)
  ans = 0.to_big_f
  m = n.to_big_f
  i = 0.to_big_f
  while i <= m
    ans += binom(m, i) ** 2
    i += 1
  end
  ans
end

def easyline(n : UInt64)
  line = [1_u64]
  n.times do
    line = ([0_u64]+line).zip(line+[0_u64]).map(&.sum)
  end
  line.map{|x| x*x}.sum
end

    return gcdi(x, -y) if y < 0
    return gcdi(y, x) if x < y

def gcdi(a : Int32, b : Int32)
  a = a.abs
  b = b.abs
  return a if a == b
  return b if a == 0
  return a if b == 0

  if a % 2 == 0
    return gcdi(a >> 1, b) if b % 2 == 1
    return gcdi(a >> 1, b >> 1) << 1
  end

  return gcdi(a, b >> 1) if b % 2 == 0

  return gcdi((a - b) >> 1, b) if a > b

  return gcdi((b - a) >> 1, a)
end

	a = a.abs
  b = b.abs

def code(s)
  return "" if s.empty?
  len = s.size
  n = Math.sqrt(len).ceil.to_i
  if len < n*n
    s += "#{11.chr}"*(n*n - len)
  end
  sq_qb = [] of Array(Char)
  n.times do |i|
    sq_qb << s[n*i, n].chars
  end
  # rotation
  sq_qb_r = [] of Array(Char)
  n.times do |y|
    l = [] of Char
    n.times do |x|
      l << sq_qb[n - x - 1][y]
    end
    sq_qb_r << l
  end
  sq_qb_r.map { |l| l.join }.join("
")
end

def decode(str)
  return "" if str.empty?
  sq_r = str.split("
").map { |l| l.chars }
  len = sq_r.size
  sq = [] of String
  len.times do |y|
    l = [] of Char
    len.times do |x|
      l << sq_r[x][len - y - 1]
    end
    sq << l.join
  end
  sq.join.rstrip(11.chr)
end

def code(c)
  #pad
  width = Math.sqrt(c.size)
  dec = (width - width.to_i)
  width += 1 if dec > 0
  width = width.to_i
  c += ( "\v" * (width*width - c.size))
  
  lines : Array(String) = [] of String
  while c.size > 0
    lines.push c.byte_slice(0, width)
    c = c.byte_slice(width)
  end
  rotate(lines.join('
'), false)
end

def decode(str)
  rotate(str, true).delete('
').delete('\v')
end

def rotate(str, counter = false)
  arr = str.split('
').map { |line| line.split("") }
  res = Array.new(arr.size) { Array.new( arr.size, "") }
  limit = arr.size-1
  (0..limit).each { |r|
    (0..limit).each { |c|
      if counter
        res[limit-c][r] = arr[r][c]
      else
        res[c][limit-r] = arr[r][c]
      end
    }
  }
  res.map { |line|
    line.join
  }.join('
')
end

  while i > 0

    return false if !arr.includes?(s)
    i -= 1
  end

def contain_all_rots(strng, arr)
      # Split strng into array
    spl = strng.split("")
    spl_length = spl.size
    # Convert arr to Set
    s = arr.to_set
    # Perform one arr rot for size of arr
    spl_length.times do
      # Check Set membership
      current_rotation = spl.rotate!().join()
      if (current_rotation) == ""
        return true
      end
      puts "Checking rotation: #{current_rotation}"
      puts "against set: #{s.to_s}"
      unless s.includes?(current_rotation)
        return false
      end
      # if Set membership fails, return false
    end

    return true
end

def contain_all_rots(strng, arr)
  return true if strng.empty?
  ret = [strng.chars]
  (strng.size-1).times.reduce(ret[0]) do |s, _|
    tmp = s.rotate
    ret << tmp
    tmp
  end
  (ret.map(&.join) - arr).empty?
end

def contain_all_rots(strng, arr)
  i = 0
  until i >= strng.size
  	if !arr.includes?(strng)
       return false
		else
       strng = strng[-1] + strng[0, strng.size-1]
       i += 1
		end
	end
  return true
end

def contain_all_rots(strng, arr)
  count = strng.size 
  arr = arr.map {|x| x.downcase}
  count.times do 
    return false if arr.includes?(strng.downcase) == false
    strng = strng.chars.rotate.join("")
  end
  return true
end

def all_rots(strng)
    (0...strng.size).each do |idx|
        yield strng[idx...strng.size] + strng[0...idx]
    end
end

def contain_all_rots(strng, arr)
    all_rots(strng) do |rot|
        if !arr.find { |e| e == rot }
            return false
        end
    end
    return true
end
